com.choschi.memdroid
Class Client

java.lang.Object
  com.choschi.memdroid.Client

public class Client
extends java.lang.Object

Handles all the requests to the webservices. To prevent double login and other issues of the same nature, it is implemented as singleton

Author:
Christoph Isch
